title: Athletic Scholarship Placement Coord.-Texas - Sports Marketing
text: Posted/Updated: 10-18-2015 Brief Job Description: Your main focus will be identifying local athletic talent and preparing these athletes for evaluation by one of our top expert evaluators to see if they are indeed at a collegiate level of ability.
